name: txyz-search
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for TXYZ Search API. Provides tools for academic and scholarly search, general web search, and smart search.

tools.name: txyz_search_scholar
tools.description: Academic and scholarly search for papers, articles, and other academic materials
tools.prompt: Find recent research papers about quantum computing

tools.name: txyz_search_web
tools.description: General web search functionality for resources from web pages
tools.prompt: Find information about the latest smartphone releases

tools.name: txyz_search_smart
tools.description: Automatically selects the best search type based on the query (may include either scholarly materials or web pages)
tools.prompt: What are the latest developments in climate change research?

prompts.name: Academic Search
prompts.description: Search for academic papers on a topic
prompts.text: Find recent research papers about quantum computing

prompts.name: Web Search
prompts.text: Find information about the latest smartphone releases

prompts.name: Smart Search
prompts.description: Let the system choose the best search type
prompts.text: What are the latest developments in climate change research?
